title: A 150-yr record of polycyclic aromatic compounds in the Sihailongwan Maar Lake, northeast China: impacts of socio-economic developments and pollution control
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00309H, Paper
jianing zhang, Chong Wei, Yongming Han, Benjamin A. Musa Bandowe, Dewen Lei, Wolfgang Wilcke
The geochemical composition of sediment cores can serve as a proxy for reconstructing past human and nature-driven environmental and climatic changes. We investigated the temporal variation in the concentrations and...
